comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Þjóðbúningar., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35965204@N07
comment._content:
In England this tool is called a Great Wheel - it is the predessessor of the spinning wheel and has no treadle, the huge wheel is turned with the hand to power the spindle which has no flyer to pull the thread in.  The spinner alternately spins and then winds by changing the angle of the thread.

The lady in the doorway is holding a hank of finished thread.

Thorskegga
